activities: (1) Personal data received in the course of Rapid 7 LLC’s activities, which could vary according to the product or service involved, but often include: offering product registration and support; conducting data analysis to improve products and services; and/or maintaining marketing relationships. (2) Human resources data. The personal information received by Rapid 7 LLC from the EU includes both personal data that Rapid 7 LLC processes as a data controller, Rapid 7 LLC alone or jointly with others determines the purposes and means of the processing of the personal data, and personal data that Rapid 7 LLC processes as a data processor on behalf of data controllers.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: Customer On-line; Customer Offline data; Customer Manually processed data; Human resources data
recoursemech: TRUSTe dispute resolution mechanism; EU Data Protection Authorities (DPAs) and Swiss Federal Data Protection and Information Commissioner (FDPIC) with respect to human resources data only
